title: Badger
description: When the girl who broke his heart years ago shows up at the Blackwings MC clubhouse for the President’s daughter’s wedding, Badger, the VP, is not only shocked, he is pissed. But a few words from his best friend’s wife leaves him with more questions than answers. And Badger never lets anything go unanswered.Badger is a 15,000 word novella expanded from 5,000 word short story previously published in the Twisted Tales of Mayhem Anthology.Adult Content Warning: Intended for readers 18 years and older due to explicit language, sexual content, and violence.
author: Teagan Brooks
